title: Driving from 17th St. to Carolina Beach Rd. on Wellington Ave. there are two (2) SEVERE depressions in the road across from the nursing home. These have been here for a number of years now. Are there any plans to repair this? It\'s feels like you just drove over two back to back ditches. Most of the time drivers have to cross into the opposite lane to avoid them.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9398
